items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: I am absolutely obsessed with these turtlenecks! They are extremely comfortable and somehow manage to be form fitting without feeling tight and revealing. They are a heavier material and the ribbing/texture does a great job at hiding imperfections so that the form fitting style doesn‚Äôt make me feel self conscious. They are the perfect length, hitting my 5‚Äô2‚Äù frame right under my hip bones so it‚Äôs not cropped but not too long making it perfect to wear with a skirt. When you first open the package they look impossibly small but stretch perfectly and an xs could probably work for sizes xxs to a bigger size small. They look great dressed up or dressed down. I‚Äôve always hated turtlenecks but everything from V28 has me thinking they aren‚Äôt bad. I‚Äôve bought multiple colors of all their turtleneck styles and they have become my go to for all my winter outfits! The tank style is great to wear under a jacket and worn on its own once inside someplace warm. I really can‚Äôt recommend these enough! They‚Äôre well worth the price and are probably some of the best made clothing on Amazon! UPDATE: Still absolutely loving these! They wash and wear so well, I‚Äôve bought so many colors! I really loved the tank top style to wear at a winter event- it gave me a lot of warmth for my neck and chest and I was able to layer it over a super thick warm thermal top, I did that because the thermal was desperately needed but it looked terrible on its own under my coat. Since this was a totally outside event I knew I would not be taking off my coat so that wacky layering was fine (honestly it didn‚Äôt look terrible if I had removed my coat just odd because the two browns would have clashed). I thought the turtleneck looked kinda cute peeking out of my coat and cloak! Read more
items.author: Alena Cooper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find!
items.body: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù 124 pounds and a C cup. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly. It‚Äôs very soft and stretchy, but also comfortably tight to the body. However, I am not used to wearing turtlenecks and have had past neck surgery and will be having another. I was wanting this to help cover the incision/scar, but it feels slightly tight to my neck. If you don‚Äôt mind a slight restriction to the front of your neck, I think this top is fabulous! I am going to keep it, because it‚Äôs very pretty and I hope I can stretch the neck just a little bit. Read more
items.author: Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality tops in nice colors.
items.body: These are very nice tops; they fit well and are comfortable. I have several others in a medium because I wanted a longer top, but ordered a small this time as I wanted a shorter top in this color. I've had the other tops for about 4 years, and they have retained their quality and color. I machine wash and dry them. Read more
items.author: bokfam

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute not quality a bit off
items.body: Neckline does lay right other than that nice soft material color is perfect. Washes well fit is wonky around the neck Read more
items.author: Aj

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made
items.body: Beautiful fabric and very well made with a comfortable fit; not too tight and yet not too loose either. I will definitely consider purchasing this in different colors. üíØ % satisfied! Read more
items.author: Lil

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent turtleneck
items.body: I bought this gorgeous sage color sleeveless sweater knit turtleneck. I do not usually anything sweater knit - I am frequently allergic to them. This one is soft and fabulous. I wore it to work and received so many compliments on its color and style. This gets 5 stars from me!!!!! Read more
items.author: Kate Salcido

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Nice, very stretchy, very soft. Hold heat. Read more
items.author: Mz. Loretta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Purple Top I Own
items.body: This is absolutely my favorite knitted top so far now! It‚Äôs comfy with a nice stretch, the color is amazingly vivid and fits me like a glove. It looks just as advertised. It has some durability built into it as the material feels very versatile. The style reminds me of something a particular cyborg warrior would wear, and is very well-layered and functional too. Read more
items.author: Jeanne

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sandybrown, Gray Lilac, Jadeblue, Dark Grey, Black, Coffee, Softgrass, Nude, Orange, Lime, Baby Blue, Tender Green, Morandi Pink, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
